name: Look
description: Your charisma, 'it' factor and ability to inhabit your character and 'live the Gimmick.' Look is most important for you if you want to cut exciting promos and create a memorable character for the fans to follow.

name: Power
description: Your raw strength, aggression, and impressiveness. Power is most important for you if you want to enjoy physical dominance over other wrestlers and stand out for your extraordinary physical presence and abilities.

name: Real
description: Your ability to 'break the fourth wall,' bring in real-world concerns, and deal with legit issues. Real is most important for you if you want to blend the line between character and performer and captivate the audience with your actual personality.

name: Work
description: Your ability to tell a story in the ring, execute moves correctly, and make others look good. Work is most important for you if you want to use your ring work to create your legacy.
